snippet: Connecticut Coach Jim Calhoun returned after serving a three-game N.C.A.A. suspension, but the eighth-ranked Huskies lost to Rutgers.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Rutgers defeats Connecticut, 67-60; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut Coach Jim Calhoun returned after serving a three-game N.C.A.A. suspension, but the eighth-ranked Huskies lost to Rutgers.

headline.seo: Rutgers Tops UConn in Calhoun’s Return
headline.main: Rutgers Defeats UConn in Calhoun’s Return
headline.print_headline: Rutgers Defeats UConn in Calhoun’s Return
